    export set QTDIR=/opt/qte_4.8

  1. æ–‡ä»¶/src/gui/embedded/qmouselinuxinput_qws.cppä¸­çš„readMouseData å‡½æ•°è·å– input å­ç³»ç»Ÿä¼ é€’çš„åæ ‡å€¼ã€‚ç”±äºè§¦æ‘¸å±ä¼ é€’çš„è§¦æ‘¸äº‹ä»¶EV_ABSä¸­ï¼Œä¼ é€’çš„codeç±»å‹ä¸­æœ‰ABS_PRESSURE é¡¹ï¼Œé»˜è®¤å¤„ç†é¡¹ä»…æœ‰ABS_Xã€ABS_Yï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¼šæ‰“å°è­¦å‘Šä¿¡æ¯ã€‚
    bool unknown = false;
if (data->type == EV_ABS) {

    } else if (data->type == EV_SYN && data->code == SYN_REPORT) {
    QPoint pos(m_x, m_y);
    pos = m_handler->transform(pos);
    m_handler->limitToScreen(pos);
    m_handler->mouseChanged(pos, m_buttons);
} else â€¦â€¦
    transformå‡½æ•°å°†è§¦æ‘¸åæ ‡ç‚¹è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå±å¹•åæ ‡ï¼Œè·³è½¬åå¾—åˆ°å¤„ç†ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š
    QPoint QWSCalibratedMouseHandler::transform(const QPoint &position)
{
    QPoint tp;
    tp.setX((a * position.x() + b * position.y() + c) / s);
    tp.setY((d * position.x() + e * position.y() + f) / s);
    return tp;
}
    ç”±æ­¤è¿”å›çš„ tp æ­£æ˜¯å±å¹•åæ ‡ï¼ŒmouseChangedå‡½æ•°å°†é¼ æ ‡ç¬¦å·ç§»åŠ¨åˆ° tp ç‚¹ä½ç½®ã€‚

    #include <stdio.h>
#include <unistd.h>
#include <sys/ioctl.h>
#include <fcntl.h>
#include <errno.h>
#include <linux/input.h>

int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
    struct input_absinfo i_absInfo;
    if (argc <= 1) {
        printf("Usage:%s dest\n", argv[0]);
        return -1;
    }

    // æ‰“å¼€è¾“å…¥è®¾å¤‡
    int fd = open(argv[1], O_RDONLY);
    if (fd < 0) {
        perror(argc[1]);
        return -1;
    }
    printf("You open the device: %s\n", argv[1]);

    // å¾—åˆ° X è½´çš„ ABS ä¿¡æ¯
    ioctl(fd, EVIOCGABS(ABS_X), &i_absInfo);
    printf("X ABS Lastest Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.value);
    printf("\tX ABS Min Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.minimum);
    printf("\tX ABS Max Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.maximum);

    // å¾—åˆ° Y è½´çš„ ABS ä¿¡æ¯
    ioctl(fd, EVIOCGABS(ABS_Y), &i_absInfo);
    printf("Y ABS Lastest Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.value);
    printf("\tY ABS Min Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.minimum);
    printf("\tY ABS Max Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.maximum);    

    // å¾—åˆ° PRESSURE è½´çš„ ABS ä¿¡æ¯
    ioctl(fd, EVIOCGABS(ABS_PRESSURE), &i_absInfo);
    printf("PRESSURE ABS Lastest Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.value);
    printf("\tPRESSURE ABS Min Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.minimum);
    printf("\tPRESSURE ABS Max Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.maximum);

    // å¾—åˆ°è§¦æ‘¸ X è½´çš„ ABS ä¿¡æ¯
    ioctl(fd, EVIOCGABS(ABS_MT_POSITION_X), &i_absInfo);
    printf("MT_POSITION_X ABS Lastest Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.value);
    printf("\tMT_POSITION_X ABS Min Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.minimum);
    printf("\tMT_POSITION_X ABS Max Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.maximum);

    // å¾—åˆ°è§¦æ‘¸ Y è½´çš„ ABS ä¿¡æ¯
    ioctl(fd, EVIOCGABS(ABS_MT_POSITION_Y), &i_absInfo);
    printf("MT_POSITION_Y ABS Lastest Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.value);
    printf("\tMT_POSITION_Y ABS Min Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.minimum);
    printf("\tMT_POSITION_Y ABS Max Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.maximum);    

    // å¾—åˆ°è§¦æ‘¸ PRESSURE è½´çš„ ABS ä¿¡æ¯
    ioctl(fd, EVIOCGABS(ABS_MT_POSITION_PRESSURE), &i_absInfo);
    printf("MT_POSITION_PRESSURE ABS Lastest Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.value);
    printf("\tMT_POSITION_PRESSURE ABS Min Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.minimum);
    printf("\tMT_POSITION_PRESSURE ABS Max Value = %d\n", i_absInfo.maximum);

    // å…³é—­è®¾å¤‡
    close(fd);
    return 0;
}
  4. æ ¹æ®ç¨‹åºè·å–åæ ‡é™åˆ¶ï¼šX è½´è§¦æ‘¸å€¼é™åˆ¶ä¸º 0 ~ 65536 ï¼Œ Y è½´è§¦æ‘¸å€¼é™åˆ¶ä¸º 0 ~ 9600 ã€‚åˆå·²çŸ¥å±å¹•åˆ†è¾¨ç‡ä¸º 1024 x 768 ï¼Œå¯å¾—å…¬å¼å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

    touchX65536=screenX1024ï¼ŒtouchY9600=screenY768\frac{touchX}{65536} = \frac{screenX}{1024}ï¼Œ\frac{touchY}{9600} = \frac{screenY}{768} 65536touchXâ€‹=1024screenXâ€‹ï¼Œ9600touchYâ€‹=768screenYâ€‹

    åˆå¾—ï¼š

    screenX=aÃ—touchX+bÃ—touchY+csscreenX = \frac{a \times touchX + b \times touchY + c}{s} screenX=saÃ—touchX+bÃ—touchY+câ€‹

    screenY=dÃ—touchX+eÃ—touchY+fsscreenY = \frac{d \times touchX + e \times touchY + f}{s} screenY=sdÃ—touchX+eÃ—touchY+fâ€‹

    ä¸ºæ–¹ä¾¿è®¡ç®—ï¼Œä½¿b=c=d=f=0b = c = d = f = 0b=c=d=f=0åˆ™å¯å¾—ï¼š

    screenX=aÃ—touchXs=1024Ã—touchX65536screenX = \frac{a \times touchX}{s} = \frac{1024 \times touchX}{65536} screenX=saÃ—touchXâ€‹=655361024Ã—touchXâ€‹

    screenY=dÃ—touchYs=768Ã—touchY9600screenY = \frac{d \times touchY}{s} = \frac{768 \times touchY}{9600} screenY=sdÃ—touchYâ€‹=9600768Ã—touchYâ€‹

    ç”±äº s å€¼å”¯ä¸€ï¼Œä¸”è§¦æ‘¸å€¼å­˜åœ¨æœ€å¤§é™å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™å¯ä½¿ s çš„å€¼ä¸º65536Ã—960065536 \times 960065536Ã—9600ã€‚åˆ™å¯å¾—ï¼š
